title: U.S . Gross Domestic Product - forecast 2019 to 2030
summary: In general GDP in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2020 to 2030.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2029 and 2030.
The highest GDP in billion U.S. dollars, of value 32003.0 was reached at Year 2030
The lowest GDP in billion U.S. dollars, of value 22111.0 was reported at Year 2020
